entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers and flurries beginning late in the afternoon then changing to flurries at times heavy. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
